function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modeling vulnerability and recoverability in a network","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation due to network disruptions","Mitigation":"Implementing resilient network design and recovery strategies","Technologies":"Resilient network infrastructure, backup systems, and recovery protocols","People":"Network engineers, infrastructure planners","Owner":"Network operators, government agencies"},{"Description":"Structural-based models for system resilience","Impact":"Inadequate resilience against contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improving system resilience through optimization and simulation models","Technologies":"Optimization algorithms, simulation software, structural modeling tools","People":"System designers, resilience planners","Owner":"Organizational leaders, research institutions"}]}
